attributes.name: description
attributes.content: An animation featuring image tiles that transform into a full image when a menu item is clicked.

attributes.content: animation, menu, image, gsap, page transition

childNodes.textContent:
Refreshing beverage infused with electrolytes and nootropics to boost mental
					clarity.
menu images get flipped over here

A drink made from a mix of algae and other superfoods that provide sustained
					energy and boost the immune system.

A cognitive enhancing drink infused with adaptogens, nootropics, and vitamins
					to enhance focus and mental clarity.

A plant-based energy drink made with maca, matcha, and other plant-based
					ingredients that help to increase energy levels and reduce stress.

A natural energy drink made with ginseng, green tea, and other herbal extracts
					that help increase endurance and reduce fatigue.

A healthy drink made with spirulina, chlorella, and other green superfoods that
					help detoxify the body and boost energy.

A fruity drink infused with vitamins and antioxidants that helps to protect the
					skin from UV damage.
